content:
Hi,
Are there plans to have tutorial sessions on FHIR DevDays covering FHIRCast?
Thanks,
Eitan
Yes, Tuesdsay afternoon, 16:20-17:00, Isaac Vetter will be talking about FHIRcast and subscriptions

Remember the FHIRcast tutorial at 11:05 in "The Howard". Also, after that we'll have a geek-out session as well as exercises. Check the schedule on the DevDays homepage for more details. See you there!
